channel.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
channel.description: I don't know what is happening but yesterday and today I have been experiencing connection problems to both sites. I'm just wondering if the site is being attacked or not, and does anyone else have the same problems; The forums seem to load a lot slower than normal and sometimes Data cannot be received from the site.

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

inertia:

Do you have any other scripts in place to block connections from certain sources?

What ‘sources’ are you referring to? The only time I block connections is when I’m under attack and then I block the attacking IPs.

Read full topic

Mopar you never answered my question

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:16, topic:288737”]MITB seems to be slow for me too.
Theres an app on fire fox called “tweak network”. I’m using it and its supposed to make fire fox faster by increasing some of the connections and some other stuff.[/quote]

Disable the add on and see if it is faster, as I said I limit connections-per-ip to 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

-.- People don’t read posts these days. MITB asked if there was any addons that do that so he could look into it and improve the system.

item.source: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:18, topic:288737”]Well he did ask for any extentions that people might be using that have it so you send more then one connection.

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=381744.msg2868261#msg2868261 date=1247592082]
What do you mean by connection problems? What browser are you using and what extensions (or plugins) do you have enabled?

The site was under attack a few days ago and I made a few configuration changes to combat this, such as only allowing 3 simultaneous connections per IP, and setting a max speed of 128 kb/s per connection. These seem like reasonable limits, but if you are running certain browsers or extensions that create more connections than that at a time you may have problems. So if you can provide me info on your setup I can try to make it work better.

Also if anyone else is having problems, please provide me with your setup too.
[/quote][/quote]

Maybe it’s because you have multiple connections like he stated…?..

… Seriously? o_o

Read full topic

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:288737”]What do you mean by connection problems? What browser are you using and what extensions (or plugins) do you have enabled?

The site was under attack a few days ago and I made a few configuration changes to combat this, such as only allowing 3 simultaneous connections per IP, and setting a max speed of 128 kb/s per connection. These seem like reasonable limits, but if you are running certain browsers or extensions that create more connections than that at a time you may have problems. So if you can provide me info on your setup I can try to make it work better.

Also if anyone else is having problems, please provide me with your setup too.[/quote]

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:

Do you have any other scripts in place to block connections from certain sources?

item.source: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

inertia:

Do you block connections which have port 80 open?

Wouldn’t that require me to connect to port 80 on every connection to my server? Practically doubling my bandwidth? Besides, proxies don’t really seem to be a problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

inertia:

Do you block connections which have port 80 open?

That would be quite a bad idea, as some people might be hosting a webserver locally, just because port 80 doesn’t mean it will solve an HTTP proxy problem…

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“The_Flames, post:9, topic:288737”]Lighttpd is definitely going to help (especially over Apache). I find it much faster and its memory usage is tiny in comparison to its rivals. I heard websites like YouTube and Wikipedia use it

I think Apache has recently stepped up its performance though.[/quote]

Also every version of Apache is vulnerable to a SlowLoris attack, whereas lighttpd isn’t

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow

item.description:
@The_Flames wrote:

Lighttpd is definitely going to help (especially over Apache). I find it much faster and its memory usage is tiny in comparison to its rivals. I heard websites like YouTube and Wikipedia use it

I think Apache has recently stepped up its performance though.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Probably, but there is not much I can do about it. I’m just happy lighttpd is so awesome, apache on this server was brought to it’s knees with much less of a load. The whole site still seems rather responsive to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Looks like we are again under a pretty large attack. Have a look:

So if it is slow right now, I don’t think there is much I can do about it. If it was slow during one of the normal periods of traffic then I want to know about it so I can do something about it.

Read full topic

item.source: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow

item.title: Moparscape and moparisthebest.org seems to be slow
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

What do you mean by connection problems? What browser are you using and what extensions (or plugins) do you have enabled?

The site was under attack a few days ago and I made a few configuration changes to combat this, such as only allowing 3 simultaneous connections per IP, and setting a max speed of 128 kb/s per connection. These seem like reasonable limits, but if you are running certain browsers or extensions that create more connections than that at a time you may have problems. So if you can provide me info on your setup I can try to make it work better.

Also if anyone else is having problems, please provide me with your setup too.

Read full topic
